content: I added Hölder's inequality (elementary form).Could someone have a look?
The Lp norm version exists. I didn't find the elementary form in mathlib.

I mean I see you are adding an n-ary version of Hölder, but:

  1. You can't claim to be adding Hölder's inequality to mathlib
  2. You should reuse the existing lemmas in your proof, or golf the existing proofs using your new lemma
Also note that all inequalities in this file have NNReal/Real/ENNReal x Finset.sum/HasSum/tsum versions, so you should be adding all of these for your new lemma too

Yep I missed NNReal.inner_le_Lp_mul_Lq which is 2-ary version with limitation of (1/p) (1/q) > 0.
What should N-ary version be named?
I'll look at how to golf using NNReal.inner_le_Lp_mul_Lq and adding the rest

Casavaca said:

What should N-ary version be named?

I don't really like the existing names, so offer some and we'll see
